name: legend
desc: Including the "legend":{} object will include a legend in the chart.

attrs.name: adjust-layoutadjustLayout
attrs.desc: Forces the plotarea to consider the legend positioning and prevent overlapping with it.

attrs.name: drag-handlerdragHandler
attrs.desc: Sets the handler used to drag the legend: icon will create a dragging icon on the legend header, which will be the only area on which you can click and drag, header will make the whole header object active for dragging the legend.

attrs.name: draggable
attrs.desc: Sets whether the legend can be dragged or not.

attrs.name: footer
attrs.desc: Sets the styling for the legend footer.

attrs.name: header
attrs.desc: Sets the styling for the legend header.

attrs.name: icon
attrs.desc: Sets the styling for the legend icons (minimize/maximize and drag).

attrs.name: item
attrs.desc: Sets the styling for the active legend items.

attrs.name: item-offitemOff
attrs.desc: Sets the styling for the inactive legend items.

attrs.name: layout
attrs.desc: Sets the layout for the legend items.

attrs.name: marker
attrs.desc: Sets the syling for the legend markers.

attrs.name: max-itemsmaxItems
attrs.desc: Sets the maximum number of items displayed on the legend. To be used with overflow.

attrs.name: minimize
attrs.desc: Sets whether the legend can be minimized or not.

attrs.name: overflow
attrs.desc: Sets the display mode for legend items beyond max-items setting: none will display all items, hidden will display just top max-items items, page will enable the pagination module, with top max-items items per page. To be used with max-item.

attrs.name: page-offpageOff
attrs.desc: Sets the styling for the inactive page navigation object (previous and next arrows).

attrs.name: page-onpageOn
attrs.desc: Sets the styling for the active page navigation object (previous and next arrows).

attrs.name: page-statuspageStatus
attrs.desc: Sets the styling for the page status text.

attrs.name: shared
attrs.desc: For graphsets with multiple chart objects, setting this attribute to true within the legend object of each chart will allow you to use one legend to toggle data on or off for each chart simultaneously. It should be noted that while each chart must have a legend object, the visible attribute can be set to false to hide a legend.

attrs.name: toggle-actiontoggleAction
attrs.desc: Sets the action performed on legend item toggle: hide will simply hide the respective plot, remove will repaint the chart without consodering the respective plot, disabled will not generate any action for the legend items/markers.

attrs.name: alpha
attrs.desc: Sets the transparency of the object. The higher the value, the less transparent the object appears.  Requires the formatting 0.x.

attrs.name: background-colorbackgroundColor
attrs.desc: Sets the background color of the object.  Colors can be entered by name (e.g. "red", "blue", "yellow"), in hexadecimal notation (e.g. "#FF0000", "#0000FF", "#FFFF00"), or in RGB notation (e.g. "rgb(255,0,0)", "rgb(0,0,255)", "rgb(255,255,0)").  One color will set a solid background color, two colors will, by default, create a horizontal gradient.  For more complex gradients, use gradient-colors and gradient-stops.

attrs.name: background-color-1backgroundColor1
attrs.desc: Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.  To be used with background-color-2.

attrs.name: background-color-2backgroundColor2
attrs.desc: Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.  To be used with background-color-1.

attrs.name: background-fitbackgroundFit
attrs.desc: Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

attrs.name: background-imagebackgroundImage
attrs.desc: Sets a background image for the object. Value can be a local file or a web image's location.

attrs.name: background-positionbackgroundPosition
attrs.desc: Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

attrs.name: background-repeatbackgroundRepeat
attrs.desc: Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

attrs.name: border-bottomborderBottom
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom border style. Accepts solid, dotted, and dashed. Also accepts named colors. If color is not set properly, will default to black.

attrs.name: border-colorborderColor
attrs.desc: Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

attrs.name: border-leftborderLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's left border style.   Accepts solid, dashed, and dotted styles.

attrs.name: border-radiusborderRadius
attrs.desc: Sets the object's border radius, for rounded corners.  The higher the value, the more rounded the corners appear.

attrs.name: border-radius-bottom-leftborderRadiusBottomLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom-left border radius, for rounded corners.  Larger values create rounder corners, while smaller values create sharper corners.  A negative value will cut a corner off without rounding.

attrs.name: border-radius-bottom-rightborderRadiusBottomRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom-right border radius, for rounded corners.  Larger values create rounder corners, while smaller values create sharper corners.  A negative value will cut a corner off without rounding.

attrs.name: border-radius-top-leftborderRadiusTopLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top-left border radius, for rounded corners.  Larger values create rounder corners, while smaller values create sharper corners.  A negative value will cut a corner off without rounding.

attrs.name: border-radius-top-rightborderRadiusTopRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top-right border radius, for rounded corners.  Larger values create rounder corners, while smaller values create sharper corners.  A negative value will cut a corner off without rounding.

attrs.name: border-rightborderRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's right border style.  Accepts solid, dashed, and dotted styles.

attrs.name: border-topborderTop
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top border style.  Values must include the border width, style, and color.  Accepts solid, dashed, and dotted styles.

attrs.name: border-widthborderWidth
attrs.desc: Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.

attrs.name: callout
attrs.desc: Sets whether an object will have a callout arrow or not.

attrs.name: callout-extensioncalloutExtension
attrs.desc: Sets the length for an extension line off the tip of the callout arrow.

attrs.name: callout-heightcalloutHeight
attrs.desc: Sets the height of the object's callout arrow.  A larger value will create a taller callout arrow.

attrs.name: callout-hookcalloutHook
attrs.desc: Sets a location for the point of the tip of the callout arrow.  Uses XY coordinates.

attrs.name: callout-offsetcalloutOffset
attrs.desc: Sets the offset for the origin of the callout arrow.  Uses positive or negative values to move the arrow right/left/up/down.

attrs.name: callout-positioncalloutPosition
attrs.desc: Sets the position for the object's callout arrow.  The position is "bottom" by default.

attrs.name: callout-widthcalloutWidth
attrs.desc: Sets which edge will be the location for the object's callout arrow.

attrs.name: fill-anglefillAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear gradient is drawn.

attrs.name: fill-offset-xfillOffsetX
attrs.desc: Sets an X offset to apply to the fill.

attrs.name: fill-offset-yfillOffsetY
attrs.desc: Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

attrs.name: fill-typefillType
attrs.desc: Sets the background gradient fill type to either linear or radial.

attrs.name: gradient-colorsgradientColors
attrs.desc: Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors).  To be used with gradient-stops.

attrs.name: gradient-stopsgradientStops
attrs.desc: Sets the position for the introduction of each color for a complex background gradient (more than 2 colors).  To be used with gradient-colors.

attrs.name: height
attrs.desc: Sets the object's height.

attrs.name: margin
attrs.desc: Sets the object's margin/s from the top-left of the chart.

attrs.name: margin-bottommarginBottom
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom margin.

attrs.name: margin-leftmarginLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's left margin.

attrs.name: margin-rightmarginRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's right margin.

attrs.name: margin-topmarginTop
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top margin.

attrs.name: offset-xoffsetX
attrs.desc: Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the legend.  A positive value moves the legend to the right.  A negative value moves the legend to the left.

attrs.name: offset-yoffsetY
attrs.desc: Sets a Y offset to apply when positioning the legend.  A positive value moves the legend down.  A negative value moves the legend up.

attrs.name: position
attrs.desc: Sets the object's position relative to its container.  Similar results can be obtained by setting [margin] and [margin-...] attributes.  Uses x,y coordinates originating from the top left of the chart.

attrs.name: shadow
attrs.desc: Sets whether the object's shadow is visible or not.  Has limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

attrs.name: shadow-alphashadowAlpha
attrs.desc: Sets the transparency of the shadow of the object.  The higher the value, the less transparent the shadow will be.

attrs.name: shadow-angleshadowAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the angle of the shadow underneath the object.

attrs.name: shadow-blurshadowBlur
attrs.desc: Sets the blur effect size for the shadow of the object. Has limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

attrs.name: shadow-colorshadowColor
attrs.desc: Sets the color of the shadow of the object.

attrs.name: shadow-distanceshadowDistance
attrs.desc: Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

attrs.name: visible
attrs.desc: Sets the visibility of the object.  Allows you to turn off the object without removing lines of JSON.

attrs.name: width
attrs.desc: Sets the object's width.

attrs.name: x
attrs.desc: Sets the X position of the object.

attrs.name: y
attrs.desc: Sets the Y position of the object.
